Room.Name: Phexton Road
Room.ShortDescription: You are on a dirt road near the Mountian Giant's Phexton village.
Room.LongDescription: the giants who live in the village are peaceful, and welcome travelers who can bring them news of the outside world. They aren't especially bright, but they do have a thriving little community and send many of their young people to Oceancrest to learn the ways of other races.
